verbs.description: Stormy Daniels [V: was] reportedly paid $ 130,000 by a Trump attorney to stay quiet about an affair from 10 years earlier .
[ARG2: Stormy Daniels] was [ARGM-ADV: reportedly] [V: paid] [ARG1: $ 130,000] [ARG0: by a Trump attorney] [ARGM-PNC: to stay quiet about an affair from 10 years earlier] .
[ARG1: Stormy Daniels] was reportedly paid $ 130,000 by a Trump attorney to [V: stay] [ARG3: quiet] [ARG3: about an affair from 10 years earlier] .
